content: आयु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [इ-उण् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 2</ls>] <ab>Ved.</ab> Living, going, moveable. --युः {@--1@} A living being, man. {@--2@} Mankind, human race. {@--3@} Living beings taken collectively. {@--4@} The first man. {@--5@} Life, duration of life. {@--6@} Wind. {@--7@} A son, descendant, offspring. {@--8@} The son of Purūravas and Urvaśī.
